name: Glitch Pattern #016 — Soft Goods
description:
Glitch Patterns is a limited series of 1/1 pattern designs that combine contemporary digitization processes with traditional textile design motifs & techniques.

A total of 100 original 1/1 editions designed by @patternbase will be minted across 6 platforms.

20 minted on token.gallery.
20 minted on Hic et Nunc.
20 minted on Screensaver.world.
20 minted on OpenSea.
10 minted on Foundation.
10 minted on KnownOrigin.
